meanings.sent1: The emeus wandered freely in the grasslands.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of emeus at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The emeus decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The emeus stood tall like ancient guardians of the savannah.
meanings.sent5: The emeus' feathers were a beautiful mix of brown and gray.

meanings.definition: Emeus: third person singular present of emeu
meanings.sent1: She emeus through the forest, searching for her lost necklace.
meanings.sent2: He often emeus around the park during his morning walks.
meanings.sent3: The cat emeus lazily on the windowsill, enjoying the warm sun.
meanings.sent4: Time emeus forward, never stopping for anyone.
meanings.sent5: The river emeus gently, carrying fallen leaves along its path.
